allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix(veo): use predictLongRunning API with instances format for BYOK

- Server: Add /api/veo/start and /api/veo/status endpoints using
  predictLongRunning with { instances: [{ prompt }] } format
- Server: Fix auth to use x-goog-api-key header (not query param)
- Server: Secure /api/proxy-video to only allow Google Files API URLs
  and block private/local IPs (SSRF protection)
- Client: Update generateVideo to poll new endpoints correctly
- Add scripts/test-veo-smoke.mjs for end-to-end testing with BYOK

Breaking: Veo generation now uses async polling instead of sync response.
The new flow: start -> poll status -> download via proxy
